A modern, declarative node-based editor framework for SwiftUI. Build interactive flowcharts, diagrams, and visual editors for macOS.

SwiftFlow brings professional node-based editing to the Swift ecosystem, inspired by React Flow and Vue Flow. Features include declarative API, interactive nodes, flexible edges, undo/redo support, MiniMap, helper lines, and zero dependencies.

Perfect for building:
• Flowchart editors
• Diagram tools
• Visual programming interfaces
• Data flow visualizers
• Node graph editors
• State machine designers

Built entirely with SwiftUI for seamless integration into macOS applications.
